name: Dandelion (mindfungus)
description:
>> ludum dare page <<

You are Dande, lion of space and time. Spring forth into the void to collect pieces of sparkle and relume the dead planets.

Controls:
[left] [right] ---------- steer
[space] --------------- swim
[esc] ------------------ quit
[~] --------------------- secret editor mode

A game by:
Kira Boom @snowkittykira
Paloma Dawkins @palomadawkins
Nicolás Muñoz @ni_mu_no
Peter Rockwell @prockwell
Cody Walker @bhane

The game was originally created in 72h for the Ludum Dare 34 game jam, an improved version was uploaded post-jam.
